originalText.text:
From the moment I stepped into this vibrant tattoo studio, I was greeted with warmth and professionalism that surpassed all expectations. The incredibly friendly team, led by the exceptionally talented Grant, has a genuine passion that is both inspiring and reassuring. Now, having seen the stunning completion of my dog's portrait, I am utterly amazed by Grant's extraordinary artistic ability. His meticulous attention to detail and his profound understanding of capturing the essence of my beloved pet in ink is nothing short of a masterpiece.

The portrait is not just a tattoo; it's a vivid, lifelike representation that brings out the unique personality of my dog. Every stroke, every shade, resonates with the love and bond we share. The depth and realism in Grant's work have left me, and everyone who sees it, in awe.

I am incredibly thankful for the dedication and skill that went into creating this beautiful piece of art. This studio is more than a place for tattoos; it's a haven where artistry and emotion converge to create something truly magnificent. I wholeheartedly recommend this shop to anyone seeking not just a tattoo, but an extraordinary piece of personalized art. Thank you, Grant and team, for this unforgettable experience and for a portrait that I will cherish for a lifetime.

originalText.text: I did some research, and decided to reach out to Red Baron Ink for my next tattoo. I wanted a NYC tattoo to commemorate my times in the city. I had an "idea", no specific artwork that I shared. Grant executed my idea beyond my imagination! I traveled from Cincinnati to have this done. We have great artists here, but I wanted to have it done in NYC. I could not be happier with my decision! From my first email, to my appointment, everything was handled so professionally and smoothly. This is a top notch studio, filled with extremely talented artists. Grant is amazing to work with, and I fully trusted him to do my piece. The staff makes you feel comfortable and welcome. I am already looking forward to booking my next appointment! Thank you, Grant and Red Baron Ink!

originalText.text: After my father passed I wanted to get a tattoo to honor his memory and after much thought, I finally decided on a design that Grant brought to life. I wasn’t entirely sure where I wanted it or how big, but Grant really helped me understand where to put it to get the best result. It far exceeded my expectations and in the short time I’ve had it, I’ve gotten so many compliments. The detail and design is amazing and I’m so happy with the final result. Grant does amazing work and is so personable and patient that he made the entire experience seamless. Highly recommend RBI and especially Grant and will definitely be coming back here when I’m ready for next one.

originalText.text: Thank you Grant for working with me and creating a beautiful piece that is near and dear to my heart. I really love the vibe of the shop and most importantly the people that work there. It was really nice to chat with you all and I look forward to getting another tat at your shop in the near future.

text.text: Thank you Grant for working with me and creating a beautiful piece that is near and dear to my heart. I really love the vibe of the shop and most importantly the people that work there. It was really nice to chat with you all and I look forward to getting another tat at your shop in the near future.

originalText.text: I went to Red Baron for a piercing! The shop was clean and very well decorated. I was pierced by Maisie and she was excellent. She explained everything she was doing, step by step, and provided details about aftercare and the specifications of my piercing. I would highly recommend selecting her as your piercer when you book. Minus one star for the sparse options of jewelry on display/available to select, so I hope they get more options in soon!
